DOC.brief_summary: To investigate safety effectiveness information use Tiotropium Respimat long time period daily practical clinical circumstance , obtain proper drug use information .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Use Survey RESPIMAT Patients With COPD
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients COPD expect treatable long term . All patient must diagnosis COPD register start treatment Tiotropium Respimat . Exclusion criterion : There special restriction , PMS observational investigation condition normal clinical practice . Spiriva Respimat contraindicate patient hypersensitivity Tiotropium bromide , atropine derivative , e.g . ipratropium oxitropium excipients Package labelling .
